actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to create a Pension Reform and Simplification Commission to evaluate and suggest ways to enhance access to the private pension plan system.
short_title: Pension Reform and Simplification Commission Act

summary.text: Pension Reform and Simplification Commission Act - Establishes the Pension Reform and Simplification Commission to study Federal laws relating to the regulation of the current private pension system and recommend changes.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Pension Reform and Simplification Commission Act
A bill to create a Pension Reform and Simplification Commission to evaluate and suggest ways to enhance access to the private pension plan system.
